mapper.sql: SELECT T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO , T_RECEIVE_MNG.LAST_UPD_DATE , T_ORDER.ORDER_SEQ , T_ORDER.ORDER_NO , T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND as "reqTypeInd", T_ORDER.ITEM_CD as "itemCd", T_ORDER.ITEM_NAME as "itemName", T_ORDER.UNIT_NAME as "unitName", T_ORDER.SUP_CD as "supCd", T_ORDER.SUP_ABBR_NAME as "supAbbrName", T_ORDER.SUBCON_IND as "subconInd", T_ORDER.EDI_IND as "ediInd", T_ORDER.DELIV_PLACE_CD as "delivPlaceCd", T_ORDER.DELIV_PLACE_NAME as "delivPlaceName", T_ORDER.ORDER_VOL as "orderVol.vol", T_ORDER.ORDER_CANCEL_VOL as "orderCancelVol.vol", T_ORDER.ORDER_DELIV_DATE as "delivDate.dateOfymd", T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_EXP_DATE as "arrivExpDate.dateOfymd", T_ARRIVAL.DELIV_VOL as "delivVol.vol" , T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_SECTION_CD as "arrivSectionCd", T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_SECTION_NAME as "arrivSectionName", T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_USER_ID as "arrivUserId", T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_USER_NAME as "arrivUserName", T_SLIP_MNG.SLIP_NO AS EXCLUSIVE_SLIP_NO, T_SLIP_MNG.LAST_UPD_DATE AS EXCLUSIVE_LAST_UPD_DATE, ${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingSelectSQLDomainAliasNonBinary("T_ORDER","searchResExtItemOrder")}, ${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingSelectSQLDomainAliasNonBinary("T_ARRIVAL","searchResExtItemArrival")}

FROM T_RECEIVE_MNG INNER JOIN T_ORDER ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.ORDER_NO = T_ORDER.ORDER_NO AND T_ORDER.NEW_APP_FLG = '1' AND T_ORDER.DELETE_FLG = '0' AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND != '9' INNER JOIN T_ARRIVAL ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.NEW_ARRIVAL_SEQ = T_ARRIVAL.ARRIVAL_SEQ AND T_ARRIVAL.DELETE_FLG = '0' AND T_ARRIVAL.INSPECT_IND = '1' INNER JOIN T_SLIP_MNG ON T_ORDER.ORDER_NO = T_SLIP_MNG.SLIP_NO AND T_SLIP_MNG.INSPECT_STATUS_IND != '2' AND T_SLIP_MNG.DELETE_FLG = '0'

${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingWhereSQL()} AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_STATUS = '2104' AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELETE_FLG = '0'
AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND IN ('2','3')
AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND IN ('2')
AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND IN ('3')
AND (( T_ORDER.REQ_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}'
AND T_ORDER.REQ_SECTION_CD IN (${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSectionViewRegion()})
AND T_ORDER.REQ_SECTION_PLACE_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getSectionPlaceCdByEscapeSql()}'
) OR ( T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}'
AND T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_SECTION_CD IN (${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSectionViewRegion()})
AND T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_SECTION_PLACE_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getSectionPlaceCdByEscapeSql()}'
))

SELECT T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO , T_RECEIVE_MNG.LAST_UPD_DATE , T_ORDER.ORDER_SEQ , T_ORDER.ORDER_NO , T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_STATUS as "delivStatus", T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND as "reqTypeInd" , T_ORDER.ITEM_CD as "itemCd" , T_ORDER.ITEM_NAME as "itemName" , T_ORDER.UNIT_NAME as "unitName" , T_ORDER.SUP_CD as "supCd" , T_ORDER.SUP_ABBR_NAME as "supAbbrName" , T_ORDER.SUBCON_IND as "subconInd" , T_ORDER.EDI_IND as "ediInd", T_ORDER.DELIV_PLACE_CD as "delivPlaceCd", T_ORDER.DELIV_PLACE_NAME as "delivPlaceName", T_ORDER.ORDER_VOL as "orderVol.vol", T_ORDER.ORDER_CANCEL_VOL as "orderCancelVol.vol", T_ORDER.ORDER_DELIV_DATE as "delivDate.dateOfymd", T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_EXP_DATE as "receiveDate.dateOfymd", T_ARRIVAL.DELIV_VOL as "receiveVol.vol", T_INSPECT.CORRECT_CD as "correctInd", T_INSPECT.INSPECT_VERSION as "historyNo", T_INSPECT.INSPECT_DATE as "inspectDate.dateOfymd", T_INSPECT.INSPECT_PASS_QUANT as "successVol.vol", T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_CD as "inspectSectionCd", T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_NAME as "inspectSectionName", T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_ID as "inspectUserId", T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_NAME as "inspectUserName", T_SLIP_MNG.SLIP_NO AS EXCLUSIVE_SLIP_NO, T_SLIP_MNG.LAST_UPD_DATE AS EXCLUSIVE_LAST_UPD_DATE, ${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingSelectSQLDomainAliasNonBinary("T_ORDER","searchResExtItemOrder")}, ${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingSelectSQLDomainAliasNonBinary("T_INSPECT","searchResExtItemInspect")}

FROM T_RECEIVE_MNG INNER JOIN T_INSPECT ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.NEW_INSPECT_SEQ = T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SEQ AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS = '04' AND T_INSPECT.DELETE_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN T_ORDER ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.ORDER_NO = T_ORDER.ORDER_NO AND T_ORDER.NEW_APP_FLG = '1' AND T_ORDER.DELETE_FLG = '0' AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND != 9 INNER JOIN T_ARRIVAL ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.NEW_ARRIVAL_SEQ = T_ARRIVAL.ARRIVAL_SEQ AND T_ARRIVAL.DELETE_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN T_SLIP_MNG ON T_ORDER.ORDER_NO = T_SLIP_MNG.SLIP_NO AND T_SLIP_MNG.DELETE_FLG = '0'

${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingWhereSQL()} AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELETE_FLG = '0' AND T_INSPECT.RB_IND = '0'
AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_STATUS = '3104'
AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND IN ('2','3')
AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND IN ('2')
AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND IN ('3')
AND ( ( T_ORDER.REQ_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}' AND T_ORDER.REQ_SECTION_CD IN (${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSectionViewRegion()}) ) OR ( T_INSPECT.INSPECT_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}' AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_CD IN (${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSectionViewRegion()}) ) )
mapper.select:
SELECT T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO , T_ORDER.ORDER_SEQ , T_RECEIVE_MNG.LAST_UPD_DATE as "lastUpdDate"
ORDER BY ${searchCondition.columnOrder.columnOrder()}

SELECT T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO, T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_EXP_DATE , T_ARRIVAL.DELIV_VOL , T_ARRIVAL.UNIT_CD, T_ARRIVAL.UNIT_NAME , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_DATE , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_PASS_QUANT , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_ACCOUNT , T_INSPECT.APP_ROUTE_NO , T_INSPECT.APP_ROUTE_NAME , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SEQ ,T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_CD as "INSPECT_SECTION_CD" ,T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_NAME as "INSPECT_SECTION_NAME" ,T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_ID as "INSPECT_USER_ID" ,T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_NAME as "INSPECT_USER_NAME" ,${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingSelectSQL("T_INSPECT")} FROM T_RECEIVE_MNG INNER JOIN T_ARRIVAL ON
T_RECEIVE_MNG.NEW_ARRIVAL_SEQ = T_ARRIVAL.ARRIVAL_SEQ
T_RECEIVE_MNG.APP_ARRIVAL_SEQ = T_ARRIVAL.ARRIVAL_SEQ
AND T_ARRIVAL.DELETE_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN T_INSPECT ON
T_RECEIVE_MNG.NEW_INSPECT_SEQ = T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SEQ
T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO = T_INSPECT.DELIV_KEY_NO AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SEQ = #{inspectSeq}
AND T_INSPECT.DELETE_FLG = '0' WHERE T_RECEIVE_MNG.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO = #{delivKeyNo} AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELETE_FLG = '0' ORDER BY T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO

SELECT T_INSPECT.DELIV_KEY_NO, T_INSPECT.UNIT_NAME , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_DATE , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_PASS_QUANT , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_ACCOUNT , T_INSPECT.APP_ROUTE_NO , T_INSPECT.APP_ROUTE_NAME , T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SEQ ,T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_CD as "INSPECT_SECTION_CD" ,T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_NAME as "INSPECT_SECTION_NAME" ,T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_ID as "INSPECT_USER_ID" ,T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_NAME as "INSPECT_USER_NAME" ,${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingSelectSQL("T_INSPECT")} FROM T_INSPECT WHERE T_INSPECT.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND T_INSPECT.DELETE_FLG = '0' ORDER BY T_INSPECT.DELIV_KEY_NO,T_INSPECT.INSPECT_VERSION,T_INSPECT.CORRECT_CD
mapper.sql:
AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELETE_FLG = '0' AND T_ORDER.NEW_FLG='1' AND T_ORDER.DELETE_FLG = '0' AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND<>'9' AND T_INSPECT.DELETE_FLG='0'
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS IN ('01','02','03')
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS = '01'
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS = '02'
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS = '03'
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_ID = #{inspectUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}' AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_CD IN (${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSectionViewRegion()})
mapper.select:
SELECT T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO ,T_ORDER.ORDER_SEQ ,T_RECEIVE_MNG.LAST_UPD_DATE as "lastUpdDate" FROM T_RECEIVE_MNG INNER JOIN T_ORDER ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.ORDER_NO = T_ORDER.ORDER_NO INNER JOIN T_INSPECT ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.NEW_INSPECT_SEQ=T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SEQ INNER JOIN T_ARRIVAL ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.NEW_ARRIVAL_SEQ=T_ARRIVAL.ARRIVAL_SEQ AND T_ARRIVAL.DELETE_FLG='0'
AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELETE_FLG = '0' AND T_ORDER.NEW_FLG='1' AND T_ORDER.DELETE_FLG = '0' AND T_ORDER.REQ_TYPE_IND<>'9' AND T_INSPECT.DELETE_FLG='0'
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS IN ('01','02','03')
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS = '01'
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS = '02'
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS = '03'
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_ID = #{inspectUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}' AND T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_CD IN (${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSectionViewRegion()})
ORDER BY ${searchCondition.columnOrder.columnOrder()}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RECEIVE_MNG SET DELIV_STATUS='2104', NEW_INSPECT_SEQ=#{preSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPD_DATE = '${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSysDateYyyyMMddHHmmssSSS()}', LAST_UPD_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}', LAST_UPD_SECTION_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getDefaultSectionCdByEscapeSql()}', LAST_UPD_USER_ID = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getUserIdByEscapeSql()}' WHERE DELIV_KEY_NO=#{inspectedListIdentify.inspectedListIdentify.delivKeyNo.delivKeyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE T_RECEIVE_MNG SET DELIV_STATUS='3104', NEW_INSPECT_SEQ=#{preSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPD_DATE = '${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSysDateYyyyMMddHHmmssSSS()}', LAST_UPD_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}', LAST_UPD_SECTION_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getDefaultSectionCdByEscapeSql()}', LAST_UPD_USER_ID = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getUserIdByEscapeSql()}' WHERE DELIV_KEY_NO=#{inspectedListIdentify.inspectedListIdentify.delivKeyNo.delivKeyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE T_INSPECT SET DELETE_FLG='1', LAST_UPD_DATE = '${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSysDateYyyyMMddHHmmssSSS()}', LAST_UPD_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}', LAST_UPD_SECTION_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getDefaultSectionCdByEscapeSql()}', LAST_UPD_USER_ID = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getUserIdByEscapeSql()}' WHERE INSPECT_SEQ=#{inspectSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE T_INSPECT SET DELETE_FLG='1', LAST_UPD_DATE = '${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSysDateYyyyMMddHHmmssSSS()}', LAST_UPD_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}', LAST_UPD_SECTION_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getDefaultSectionCdByEscapeSql()}', LAST_UPD_USER_ID = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getUserIdByEscapeSql()}' WHERE RB_SEQ=#{inspectSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RB_IND='1'
mapper.select: SELECT T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO, T_RECEIVE_MNG.LAST_UPD_DATE AS "LAST_UPD_DATE1", T_ORDER.ORDER_SEQ, T_ORDER.ORDER_NO, T_ORDER.BUYER_COMPANY_CD, T_ORDER.DELIV_PLACE_CD, T_ORDER.DELIV_PLACE_NAME, T_ORDER.ITEM_CD, T_ORDER.ITEM_NAME, T_ORDER.ORDER_VOL, T_ORDER.ORDER_CANCEL_VOL, T_ORDER.UNIT_CD AS "UNIT_CD1", T_ORDER.UNIT_NAME AS "UNIT_NAME1", T_ORDER.ORDER_DELIV_DATE, T_ORDER.CURRENCY_CD, T_ORDER.UNIT_PRICE, T_ORDER.UNIT_PRICE_IND, T_ORDER.ORDER_AMOUNT, T_ORDER.ORDER_CANCEL_AMOUNT, T_ORDER.SUP_CD, T_ORDER.SUP_ABBR_NAME, T_ORDER.SUBCON_IND, T_ORDER.EDI_IND, T_ORDER.TAX_IND, T_ORDER.TAX_RATE, T_ORDER.ORDER_CNV_RATE, T_ORDER.TITLE_NAME, T_ORDER.KATASHIKI, T_ORDER.MANUFACT_CD, T_ORDER.MANUFACT_NAME, T_ORDER.ORDER_FIRST_DATE AS "ORDER_DATE", T_ORDER.FOR_SUPPRIER_COMMENT, T_ARRIVAL.DELIV_VOL, T_ARRIVAL.TOTAL_AMOUNT, T_ARRIVAL.UNIT_NAME AS "UNIT_NAME2", T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_EXP_DATE, T_ARRIVAL.HAVE_IN_STOCK_FLG, T_ARRIVAL.STOCK_COMPANY_CD, T_ARRIVAL.STOCK_SECTION_PLACE_CD, T_ARRIVAL.STOCK_PLACE_CD, T_ARRIVAL.STOCK_PLACE_NAME, T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_REMARK, T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_COMPANY_CD, T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_SECTION_CD, T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_SECTION_NAME, T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_USER_ID, T_ARRIVAL.ARRIV_USER_NAME, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SEQ, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_PASS_QUANT, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_DATE, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_ACCOUNT, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_PLACE_CD, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_PLACE_NAME, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_COMPANY_CD, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_COMPANY_NAME, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_CD, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SECTION_NAME, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_ID, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_USER_NAME, T_INSPECT.APP_ROUTE_NO, T_INSPECT.APP_ROUTE_NAME, T_INSPECT.INSPECT_STATUS, T_INSPECT.UNIT_NAME AS "UNIT_NAME3", T_INSPECT.INSPECT_VERSION, T_INSPECT.RB_IND, T_INSPECT.RB_SEQ, T_INSPECT.SEND_IND, T_INSPECT.FAX_SEND_IND, T_INSPECT.PRINT_IND, T_INSPECT.BI_OUT_IND, T_INSPECT.CORRECT_CD, T_INSPECT.LAST_UPD_DATE AS "LAST_UPD_DATE2", T_SLIP_MNG.SLIP_NO AS EXCLUSIVE_SLIP_NO, T_SLIP_MNG.LAST_UPD_DATE AS EXCLUSIVE_LAST_UPD_DATE, ${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingSelectSQL("T_INSPECT")} FROM T_ORDER INNER JOIN T_RECEIVE_MNG ON T_ORDER.ORDER_NO = T_RECEIVE_MNG.ORDER_NO AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELETE_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN T_ARRIVAL ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.APP_ARRIVAL_SEQ = T_ARRIVAL.ARRIVAL_SEQ LEFT JOIN T_INSPECT ON T_RECEIVE_MNG.NEW_INSPECT_SEQ = T_INSPECT.INSPECT_SEQ LEFT JOIN T_SLIP_MNG ON T_SLIP_MNG.SLIP_NO = T_ORDER.ORDER_NO AND T_SLIP_MNG.DELETE_FLG = '0' WHERE T_ORDER.ORDER_SEQ = #{orderSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND T_RECEIVE_MNG.DELIV_KEY_NO = #{delivKeyNo.delivKeyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T_ORDER.INFO_CD <> '0504' AND T_ORDER.NEW_APP_FLG = '1'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_INSPECT( INSPECT_SEQ, DELIV_KEY_NO, ORDER_NO, INSPECT_VERSION, CORRECT_CD, PRE_SEQ, RB_IND, RB_SEQ, INSPECT_STATUS, INSPECT_DATE, INSPECT_COMPANY_CD, INSPECT_COMPANY_NAME, INSPECT_SECTION_PLACE_CD, INSPECT_SECTION_PLACE_NAME, INSPECT_SECTION_CD, INSPECT_SECTION_NAME, INSPECT_USER_ID, INSPECT_USER_NAME, INSPECT_PASS_QUANT, UNIT_CD, UNIT_NAME, INSPECT_ACCOUNT, APP_ROUTE_NO, APP_ROUTE_NAME, SEND_IND, FAX_SEND_IND, PRINT_IND, BI_OUT_IND, DELETE_FLG, AUTO_DELETE_FLG, AUTO_DELETE_DATE, ${@ps.common.util.ItemSettingUtil@getItemSettingInsertSQL()}, LAST_UPD_DATE, LAST_UPD_COMPANY_CD, LAST_UPD_SECTION_CD, LAST_UPD_USER_ID, REG_DATE, REG_COMPANY_CD, REG_SECTION_CD, REG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{newSeqNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delivKeyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historyNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{correctInd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rbInd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rbSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inspectStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspectDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionPlaceCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionPlaceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
'${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyNameByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getSectionPlaceCdByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getSectionPlaceNameByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getDefaultSectionCdByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getDefaultSectionNameByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getUserIdByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getUserNameByEscapeSql()}',
#{passQuant, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appRouteNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appRouteName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendInd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faxSendInd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printInd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{biOutInd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', '0', '',
#{textExtItem1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textExtItem2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textExtItem3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textExtItem4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textExtItem5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textExtItem6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textExtItem7, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textExtItem8, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textExtItem9, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textExtItem10, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrayExtItem1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrayExtItem2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrayExtItem3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrayExtItem4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrayExtItem5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateExtItem1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateExtItem2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateExtItem3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateExtItem4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateExtItem5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem7, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem8, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem9, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intExtItem10, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decExtItem1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decExtItem2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decExtItem3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decExtItem4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decExtItem5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem7, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem8, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem9, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selExtItem10, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chkExtItem1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chkExtItem2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chkExtItem3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chkExtItem4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chkExtItem5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileExtItem1_fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileExtItem1_binary, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{fileExtItem2_fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileExtItem2_binary, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{fileExtItem3_fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileExtItem3_binary, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{mstExtItem1_mstKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem1_mstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem2_mstKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem2_mstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem3_mstKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem3_mstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem4_mstKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem4_mstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem5_mstKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem5_mstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem6_mstKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem6_mstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem7_mstKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem7_mstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem8_mstKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstExtItem8_mstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
'${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSysDateYyyyMMddHHmmssSSS()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getDefaultSectionCdByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getUserIdByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSysDateYyyyMMddHHmmssSSS()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getDefaultSectionCdByEscapeSql()}', '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getUserIdByEscapeSql()}' )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(T_INSPECT.INSPECT_VERSION) FROM T_INSPECT WHERE T_INSPECT.DELIV_KEY_NO = #{delivKeyNo} AND T_INSPECT.DELETE_FLG = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE T_INSPECT SET DELETE_FLG = '1' ,LAST_UPD_DATE = '${@fw.common.util.AppUtil@getSysDateYyyyMMddHHmmssSSS()}' ,LAST_UPD_COMPANY_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getCompanyCdByEscapeSql()}' ,LAST_UPD_SECTION_CD = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getDefaultSectionCdByEscapeSql()}' ,LAST_UPD_USER_ID = '${@fw.security.SecurityUtil@getUserIdByEscapeSql()}' WHERE INSPECT_SEQ = #{seqNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
